utils

Class GeneTaggingUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.GeneTaggingUtils

  • public class GeneTaggingUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a utility class that has methods used across all annotators
    Author:
    vravuri

    • Method Detail

      • addToAnnotator

        public void addToAnnotator(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas aJCas,
                  java.lang.String lineCode,
                  int start,
                  int end,
                  java.lang.String content)
        Adds the gene phrase as an annotation
        Parameters:
        aJCas - CAS to which the annotations is added
        lineCode - Unique ID of the line
        start - Start index of the phrase
        end - End index of the phrase
        content - Phrase content that will be annotated

      • populateLineMetadata

        public void populateLineMetadata(PosTagNamedEntityRecognizer ner,
                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> namedEntityPresence,
                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> startIndexes,
                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> endIndexes,
                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> wordList,
                        java.lang.String line)
                          throws org.apache.uima.resource.ResourceInitializationException
        The required metadata like startindex of the word in the line, end index of the word in the line, whether the name is a named entity or not and the list of words in a list is retrieved and returned. This metadata eases many calculations that will be performed later on the line by the annotator.
        Parameters:
        ner - Named entity recognizer
        namedEntityPresence - Existance of a word in the named entity
        startIndexes - Start index of every word in the line
        endIndexes - End index of every word in the line
        wordList - List of words in the line
        line - Line for which the metadata is being computed
        Throws:
        org.apache.uima.resource.ResourceInitializationException - When any issue with the named entity recognizer

      • getLineCode

        public java.lang.String getLineCode(java.lang.String line)
        Returns the unique ID of the line
        Parameters:
        line - Line for which the unique ID is returned
        Returns:
        Unique ID

      • getLineData

        public java.lang.String getLineData(java.lang.String line)

        Parameters:
        line - Line for which the data is returned
        Returns:
        Data of the line

      • getAdjustedIndex

        public int getAdjustedIndex(java.lang.String line,
                   int index)
        Adjusted index of the provided index by removing white space character occurrences
        Parameters:
        line - Line being used to calculate the index
        index - Input index for which adjusted value is being calculated
        Returns:
        Adjusted index value
